Hi folks,

I'm looking for a crawler that I can embed in a client side Java=
 app (the OWASP Zed Attack Proxy).
Heritrix looks good, but I'm worried abo=
ut the number of jars in the lib directory, and the fact that many of them =
are out of date.
For example, we already use commons-lang 1.4, codex 1.4 an=
d logging 1.1.1.
I dont want to revert these (or any other jars) to older v=
ersions.
Can anyone tell me what the minimum set of jars I can add to my ap=
p in order to use Heritrix inline? And if I'm likely to hit problems if I u=
se later versions of any of them?

Many thanks,

Psiinon
